mng: from, via, passing through, through (a gap), past, ever (followed by negative, meaning never), (formerly pr. [zong4] and related to 縱|纵) to follow, to comply with, to obey, to join, to engage in, adopting some mode of action or attitude, follower, retainer, accessory, accomplice, related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor
